manualMode.label: Manual Input
manualMode.guide1: Enter defining text for the persona and click Create.
manualMode.guide2:
Enter a name and attributes.
Describe attributes clearly to make personas easier to find; you may also assign a group.

fileMode.label: upload a file
fileMode.notes: Supported format: JPEG (Please convert any reference materials into JPEG)

personaDescription.label: Persona Description:
personaDescription.notes: You can also edit the text directly.
